import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h_, w_ = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(h * w - h_ * w_)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h_, w_ = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

    print (h - h_) * w + (w - w_) * h_

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    h, w = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    h_, w_ = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

    print(h*w - h_*w - h*w_ + h_*w_)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    # h, w = list(map(int, input().split()))
    h, w = 3, 2
    # hh, ww = list(map(int, input().split()))
    hh, ww = 2, 1
    print(h*w-hh*ww)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

(H, W) = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
(h, w) = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

print((H-h)*(W-w))
